comments.author: rosalind earp

comments.text:
+rosalind earp That is a horrible thing to ask, one girl I loved dearly and 
commited suicide, she got engaged to a very mean person, and he pushed her 
to the brink of committing suicide. For the last 20 years, my life hasn't 
been the same. Truth, truth I am telling you, it is only after someone 
leaves this world that by the size of the hole left inside us we discover 
just how much that person was part of us. If you feel this way know that... 
you are also such a big part of someone's world.
